name: The Last of Us II Level Design
name_original: The Last of Us II Level Design
description:
A speculative level design project about The Last of Us Part II exploring a potential level for the game. In this scenario, Ellie is searching Seattle for a firefly who may have information on what happened in Part I. 

To learn more about the development of this project, visit: The Last of Us Level Design Study | by Kaleb Nekumanesh | Medium
